alert.note: Alert for Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 08 at 1:44PM MST until November 09 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds increasing to 25 to 35 mph, with gusts from 45 to 55 mph. Areas of blowing dust and sand possible. * WHERE...Much of northern and eastern Arizona located along and north of the Mogollon Rim and the White Mountains. * WHEN...From noon to 6 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
